text: Arau iyahudisakale kaya, â€˜allahara hata raud'dhaâ€™. Daraacalate sihamtara hate'i raud'dha karaa haiche arau sihamte yi kaya se'i babe sihamta abhisapta, baram allahara ubhaya hate'i prasaraita; yenekai iccha te'om dana karae. Tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa tomara prati yi aratirna karaa haiche seya niscaya sihamtara bahutarae abadhyata arau kupharai brd'dhi karaiba. Ami sihamtara majata kiyamata paryanta sthayi satrauta arau bidbesa dhali dicho. Yetiya'i sihamte yud'dhara ju'i lagaya tetiya'i allahe seya numa'i diye arau sihamte prthiraita biparyaya karai phurae; arau allahe biparyayakaraisakalaka bhala napaya
